tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc00description: ALCT: alct0 valid pattern flag received
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc01description: ALCT: alct1 valid pattern flag received
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc03description: ALCT: trigger path ECC; 1 bit Error corrected
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc04description: ALCT: trigger path ECC; 2 bit Error uncorrected
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc05description: ALCT: trigger path ECC; > 2 bit Error uncorrected
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc06description: ALCT: trigger path ECC; > 2 bit Error blanked
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc07description: ALCT: alct replied ECC; 1 bit Error corrected
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc08description: ALCT: alct replied ECC; 2 bit Error uncorrected
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc09description: ALCT: alct replied ECC; > 2 bit Error uncorrected
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc11description: ALCT: raw hits readout - CRC Error
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc19description: CLCT: Pretrigger on ME1A CFEB 4 only
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc20description: CLCT: Pretrigger on ME1B CFEBs 0-3 only
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc21description: CLCT: Discarded, no wrbuf available, buffer stalled
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc22description: CLCT: Discarded, no ALCT in window
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc23description: CLCT: Discarded, CLCT0 invalid pattern after drift
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc24description: CLCT: CLCT0 pass hit thresh, fail pid_thresh_postdrift
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc25description: CLCT: CLCT1 pass hit thresh, fail pid_thresh_postdrift
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc26description: CLCT: BX pretrig waiting for triads to dissipate
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc27description: CLCT: clct0 sent to TMB matching section
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc28description: CLCT: clct1 sent to TMB matching section
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc29description: TMB: TMB accepted alct*clct, alct-only, or clct-only
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc34description: TMB: TMB match reject event, queued for nontrig readout
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc35description: TMB: TMB matching discarded an ALCT pair
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc36description: TMB: TMB matching discarded a CLCT pair
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc37description: TMB: TMB matching discarded CLCT0 from ME1A
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc38description: TMB: TMB matching discarded CLCT1 from ME1A
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc45description: TMB: ALCT0 copied into ALCT1 to make 2nd LCT
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc46description: TMB: CLCT0 copied into CLCT1 to make 2nd LCT
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc47description: TMB: LCT1 has higher quality than LCT0 (ranking Error)
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc52description: TMB: MPC rejected both LCT0 and LCT1
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc54description: L1A: L1A received, TMB in L1A window
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc55description: L1A: L1A received, no TMB in window
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc56description: L1A: TMB triggered, no L1A in window
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc59description: STAT: Raw hits buffer had to be reset
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc62description: STAT: Parity Error in CFEB or RPC raw hits RAM
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc70description: ALCT:Struct Error, expect ALCT0[10:1]=0 when alct0vpf=0
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc71description: ALCT:Struct Error, expect ALCT1[10:1]=0 when alct1vpf=0
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc72description: ALCT:Struct Error, expect ALCT0vpf=1 when alct1vpf=1
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc73description: ALCT:Struct Error, expect ALCT0[10:1]>0 when alct0vpf=1
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc74description: ALCT:Struct Error, expect ALCT1[10:1]=0 when alct1vpf=1
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc75description: ALCT:Struct Error, expect ALCT1!=alct0 when alct0vpf=1
tns:tmbCounterDescriptionDSE.tns:tc87description: TMB: Time since last Hard Reset
